processFoto

protected void processFoto(com.aetrion.flickr.photos.Photo foto)
This method gets called in the loading thread of the fotos. This method can be overridden and used to process the newly loaded foto in different ways.

Parameters:
foto - the foto

getSearchedFotoList

public com.aetrion.flickr.photos.PhotoList getSearchedFotoList(com.aetrion.flickr.photos.SearchParameters sp,
                                                               int n,
                                                               int startPage,
                                                               boolean isGeoSearch)
Searches fotos on flickr with the specified searchparameters.

Parameters:
sp - the sp
n - number of fotos to search for
startPage - offset of the result pages to start from
isGeoSearch - the is geo search
Returns:
the searched foto list the list of found fotos
